original_text: They were enjoying their time together. Suddenly, some wicked men who lived in the city came to the house. They stood all around it and they hit the door hard. They shouted to the old man who lived there, ‘Bring out the man who came to visit you. We want to have sex with him.’
korean_text: 그들이 마음을 즐겁게 할 때에 그 성읍의 불량배들이 그 집을 에워싸고 문을 두들기며 집 주인 노인에게 말하여 이르되 네 집에 들어온 사람을 끌어내라 우리가 그와 관계하리라 하니

sentences.original_text: They were enjoying their time together
Suddenly, some wicked men who lived in the city
sentences.korean_translation: 갑자기, 도시에 사는 어떤 악한 남자들이

sentences.original_text: and they hit the door hard
They shouted to the old man who lived there
Bring out the man who came to visit you
We want to have sex with him
